verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, Thou fount of every blessing, newline Tune my heart to sing Thy grace. newline Streams of mercy, never ceasing, newline Call for songs of loudest praise. newline Teach me some melodious sonnet, newline Sung by flaming tongues above. newline Praise the mount! I'm fixed upon it, newline Mount of God's unchanging love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Here I raise my Ebenezer; newline Hither by Thy help I come. newline And I hope, by Thy good pleasure, newline Safely to arrive at home. newline Jesus sought me when a stranger newline Wand'ring from the fold of God; newline He, to rescue me from danger, newline Interposed His precious blood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh, to grace how great a debtor newline Daily I'm constrained to be! newline Let thy grace, Lord, like a fetter, newline Bind my wand'ring heart to Thee: newline Prone to wander, Lord, I feel it, newline Prone to leave the God I love. newline Here's my heart, Lord, take and seal it, newline Seal it for Thy courts above.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Hither to Thy love has blest me; newline Thou hast bro't me to this place; newline And I know Thy hand will bring me newline Safely home by Thy good grace. newline Jesus sought me when a stranger, newline Wandering from the fold of God; newline He, to rescue me from danger, newline Bought me with His precious blood.
